name: Boomerang Fu
summary: Slice and dice your friends with boomerangs in this frantic physics party game. Join a crew of your favorite foods as you grill, chill and spill your enemies. Discover ridiculous power-ups and stack them together in deadly combinations.
info:
• 别名: 随动回旋镖
  • 别名: ブーメランヒュー
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 6人
  • 发行日期: 2020-08-13
  • 官方网站: http://www.boomerangfu.com
  • 开发: Cranky Watermelon
  • 发行: Cranky Watermelon
